response.original_title: care could suck in the future [sic]
response.overview: Artist Arden Carlson cribs the educational how-to format to render a queerly comic, sparsely staged, meticulously choreographed instructional video for enacting care, and splices it with a series of interstitial stock footage sequences of wild horses, each one narrated by a disembodied voice-of-God praising the attributes of horses with a patriarchal authority defining of 1950s America. care could suck in the future [sic] is a darkly funny coupling of dystopic retrofuturism and video mixtape.
response.title: care could suck in the future [sic]
